entries.title: Borderlands movie goes back for reshoots with Deadpool director taking over
entries.description: We only have one question about the movie: EXPLOSIONS?!

entries.title: YouTuber Dunkey's publisher, BigMode, has revealed its first game
entries.description: Animal Well is an eerie Metroidvania set in an underground civilization.

entries.title: This indie dev made a free, 3D horror version of Minesweeper set in a masquerade ball
entries.description: The Infernal Masquerade is just as addictive as 2D Minesweeper, and it offers a nice spooky twist on the idea.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 568 answer and hint for Sunday, January 8
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #568 puzzle.

entries.title: 100% essential Skyrim mod lets you see yourself in the inventory menu
Artist banned from art subreddit because their work looked AI-generated
entries.description: I'm not sure if that's a compliment or not.

entries.title: Microsoft runs pro-union ad in push to acquire Activision Blizzard
entries.description: A big ad in the Washington Post... in tandem with a huge media union.

entries.title: NYC public schools have banned ChatGPT over cheating concerns, while the bot itself insists it is anti-plagiarism
entries.description: My tutor just failed the Voigt-Kampff test again.

entries.title: EVE Online has two expansions coming in 2023 following a 2022 boom
entries.description: By "boom" they mean a 75% increase in PvP kills.

entries.title: Left 4 Dead prototype leaks
entries.description: A playable version of the Counter-Strike map that inspired the zombie FPS has appeared online.
